citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process between 11:10am -
11:40am on October 6, 2023. The inspector spoke to a neighbor who stated that the licensee was not at home that day.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process between 11:10am - 
11:40am on October 6, 2023. The inspector spoke to a neighbor who stated that the licensee was not at home that day. 
 
 
End Section
